Constructor Detail

Client

public Client(java.lang.String baseUrl,
              java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String password,
              boolean auth)
       throws java.io.IOException
allows for simple creation of an authenticated http client session with objectstorage api

Parameters:
baseUrl - the base url for the objectstorage instance
username - username for SL portal user to be used for susequent calls
password - password for the given user or the api key as a String
Throws:
java.io.IOException

Parameters:

makeSearchUrl

protected static java.lang.String makeSearchUrl(java.lang.String query,
                                                java.lang.Long limit,
                                                java.lang.Long start,
                                                java.lang.String field,
                                                java.lang.String type,
                                                java.lang.String format,
                                                java.lang.String marker,
                                                boolean recursive)
Utility for creating a request param search string

Parameters:
base - the base url for objectstorage api
query - terms for searching
limit - number of results to return (pass null for default value)
start - pagination offset for results to return (pass null for default value)
field - name of a field to limit the search to (pass null for default value)
type -
format -
marker -
recursive -
Returns:
a string url query
